Label.en: When the Paris underground was created in the early 1900s, it was meant to be strictly for the centre...
Label.fr: Quand le métropolitain a été crée au début des années 1900, il n'était pas prévu de raccorder la banlieu...
Label.es: When the Paris underground was created in the early 1900s, it was meant to be strictly for the centre...
Label.zh: When the Paris underground was created in the early 1900s, it was meant to be strictly for the centre...

Label.en: This is because the designers were scared that it would encourage people to leave the city center for the suburbs, like what had happened in London!
Label.fr: Certains concepteurs pensaient que cela encouragerait les habitants à quitter le centre ville pour la banlieu, comme cela avait été le cas à Londres !
Label.es: This is because the designers were scared that it would encourage people to leave Paris for the suburbs!
Label.zh: This is because the designers were scared that it would encourage people to leave Paris for the suburbs!

Label.en: But later, in the 1970s, the Paris regional government changed their minds, and wanted to connect the city with the suburbs...
Label.fr: Mais dans les années 70, la région de Paris voulait au contraire connecter les banlieues à Paris et entre elles...
Label.es: But later, in the 1970s, the Paris regional government changed their minds, and wanted to connect the city with the suburbs...
Label.zh: But later, in the 1970s, the Paris regional government changed their minds, and wanted to connect the city with the suburbs...

Label.en: Hey, government priorities change over time!
Label.fr: Facile à dire avec le recul !
Label.es: Hey, government priorities change over time!
Label.zh: Hey, government priorities change over time!
